lexUnit.name: shiver.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: shake slightly and uncontrollably as a result of being cold, frightened, or excited.

sentence.text: Tommy shivered as the cold hit him .
The room was unbearably warm , the gas fire on full , yet Maggie shivered as she lifted her mug to her lips .
The clouds were beginning to gather , hiding the hunter 's moon , and Ranulf shivered as he heard an owl hoot and the ominous chatter of other night birds .
She shivered as she recalled Lotta 's beautiful , animated face .
Athelstan shivered as he remembered his nightmare and the eerie stillness of that terrible dream .
Santa shivered when Suzanne wrapped his body in cold , clammy bandages which had been pre-soaked in a solution of menthol , camphor , marine algae and alcohol .
Despite himself , Bishop shivered when he heard the flat intonation of Tiw Heimdall 's voice .
She shivered involuntarily , a reaction prompted by something other than cold …
Yanto shivered slightly as he turned towards the Blue Boar 's front porch .
A momentary cloud passed in front of the sun and Liza shivered slightly .
She shivered slightly at the steely note in his voice .
He shivered suddenly , and even that was not unpleasant .
Gazzer was shivering uncontrollably with cold and panic .
She was shivering uncontrollably , but not because she was cold .
She was shivering violently .
Polly 's skin crawled and she shivered violently .
She was shivering against him , and he helped her back to the fire and bundled her in his own bedroll ; but she kept her arms about him .
She shivered at some ill-defined idea , drifting past out of reach , in the foggy recesses of her mind .
She shivers at the memory , and adds : ` I want to swing .
She shivered at the thought of it .
Bodie shivered at the thought of undergoing the same operation as his colleague .
I shivered at the warning .
I shivered from the cold .
He blinked again and shivered from head to toe .
She was shivering with delight and pent-up desire .
Leonora shivered with pleasure as Penry 's long fingers caressed the length of brown thigh below her brief denim shorts .
Jezrael shivered in anticipation .
Outside the phone box , she shivered in the breeze .
She shivered in her lavendered sheets , imploring herself to rest , trying not to think of the dreadful thing Finn had said .
I shivered in terror as I saw her face which was becoming more and more dragon-like with every minute .
A few moments later he shivered again , sneezed and decided the time had come to return to his mates and forget it .
The wind and wet had sucked the warmth out of his blood and he shivered constantly .
And he shivered energetically and swung his arms and clapped his shoulders .
Fergus looked at him and Rory shivered .
